fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink in the browsers listed in the environment field

Actual results:
1. In IE - A broken image is displayed to the left of a table row where the title is located *see screenshot*
2. In both Safari and Firefox - no images are displayed
fields.summary: MobileWeb : Table Rows - Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari: In Kitchen Sink table row detail/disclosure images are not displayed
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.9.0.v20120209110134
Windows 7
Internet Explorer 9, Firefox 10.0, Safari 5.1.2

comments.body: This bug was fixed in TIMOB-7343
